footerTitle: Try to win the Iphone Xs today and take part in the lottery. The lucky winner will be contacted by e-mail.
footerDesc_1: Thanks to your membership, you also participate in our contest to win a . We will draw a winner every 600 participants. The next winner will be drawn on 02.05.2019, and will be notified directly by e-mail. If the reward is out of stock, the winner will instead receive a similar product of equal or greater value.
footerDesc_2: We make sure that our members provide a detailed history of transactions so that they know what they are paying. Credit card information is only required to facilitate future purchases. There will be no charges for your credit card statement if you do not upgrade to PREMIUM membership and do not make a purchase.
footerQues_3: Why do we need your billing information
footerDesc_3: By joining this service, you will receive a 5-day trial of our partner's program. If you continue with a subscription beyond the 5-day trial period, you will be charged an amount of your credit card, which varies depending on the choice. When your contribution is deducted from your credit card or other payment method, you will retain access to these services, which are reserved exclusively to members who pay for access on our Partner Website.
